live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52510.summary: Some customers in the Kitsilano area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52510.title: Aug 12 - Vancouver (Kitsilano) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
